videos.prompt: San Francisco Ferry Building in 1900, the grand Beaux-Arts terminal with its iconic clock tower, crowds of well-dressed commuters in bowler hats and long skirts streaming toward ferry boats, horse-drawn carriages and early automobiles on the Embarcadero, American flags flying, steam whistles and bell sounds implied by the bustling activity. Sweeping crane shot revealing the full building facade.
